# Drone News 48h Brief — December 17, 2025

_Window: last 48 hours; 28 incidents._

## Summary
In the past 48 hours, drone incidents have been reported across various categories, including terrorism, smuggling, and airport security. Notable incidents include drone attacks on security agencies in Libya in response to organized crime, the thwarting of a drug smuggling attempt via drone in Jordan, and significant investments in airport drone defense in Latvia to protect against potential attacks. Also reported were multiple drone crashes, one involving military operations in Poland and others near residential areas. The week highlighted the dual-use nature of drones, revealing ongoing illegal activities and regulatory challenges surrounding drone deployments for law enforcement and agricultural purposes.

**By category:** airport: 2 • arrest: 2 • crash: 3 • other: 11 • security: 2 • smuggling: 4 • surveillance: 1 • terrorism: 3
**Top queries:** drone illegal (6), drone terrorism (6), drone arrest (4), drone incident (4), drone security breach (2)
